content.prompt: Malagan displays like the one shown, containing elaborately carved and painted figures, poles, and friezes, were usually intended to

choices.label: be used as a stage for a new king during royal coronation ceremonies
serve as a ceremonial space for the reception of foreign dignitaries

be revealed at the height of commemorative ceremonies honoring the dead
